description: Opal is the Gym Leader of Ballonlea`s Gym located at the Ballonlea Stadium in the Galar Region. She met Ash Ketchum and Goh deep in Glimwood Tangle when they were searching for Chloe. She quized them for a long time so they`d stay put as she realized that Chloe would probably show up at the house in the forest where they were.
name: Poplar
